name: PDFBorder
desc: An optional border for an annotation that lies completely within the annotation rectangle.

items.name: enum PDFBorderStyle
items.desc: PDF Kit annotation borders may have the following styles.

items.name: var lineWidth: CGFloat
items.desc: Sets the line width (in points) for the border.

items.name: var dashPattern: [Any]?
items.desc: Gets the dash pattern for the border as an array of NSNumber objects.

items.name: var borderKeyValues: [AnyHashable : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary that contains a deep copy of all border properties.
